name: part_011
file: tmp_【#SSholoX】世界征服に向けて…【3Dアジトお披露目】 [aGp1Q3aH_Bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: The members of holoX perform the song 'Dappou Rock'.
The members catch their breath and talk about their first group performance.
La+ Darknesss announces the addition of holoX 3D Acrylic Stands to the official shop.
La+ Darknesss announces special 3D celebration goods, including a diorama and container box.
The members prepare to perform their final song.

subtitles.original: 吸って吐いて
subtitles.english: Inhale, exhale,

subtitles.original: それが脱法ロックの
subtitles.english: that's the Dappou Rock

subtitles.original: 作法なんですわ
subtitles.english: etiquette.

subtitles.original: 天才なんて知らない
subtitles.english: I don't know about geniuses,

subtitles.original: 知らない
subtitles.english: I don't know.

subtitles.original: ボリュームを一つも
subtitles.english: Don't turn down

subtitles.original: 下げない 下げない
subtitles.english: the volume, not one bit.

subtitles.original: のべつ幕なし 決めろ 決めろ
subtitles.english: Without a moment's rest, strike a pose, strike a pose.

subtitles.original: それが脱法ロックの
subtitles.english: That's the Dappou Rock

subtitles.original: 作法なんですわ
subtitles.english: etiquette.

subtitles.original: 年中イキっていこう
subtitles.english: Let's keep showing off all year round!

subtitles.original: Wow wow wow wow...
subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow...

subtitles.original: （歓声と拍手）
subtitles.english: (Cheering and applause)

subtitles.original: ノキトと脱法ロック聴いていただきました！
subtitles.english: You've just listened to 'Nokito' and 'Dappou Rock'!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がってもらえましたかー！？
subtitles.english: Did you guys get hyped up!?

subtitles.original: ありがとうございまーす！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ疲れたね！
subtitles.english: That was exhausting!

subtitles.original: 体力を酷使してたね。
subtitles.english: That really took a lot out of us.

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ良かった。
subtitles.english: It was amazing.

subtitles.original: ラプラスどうだった？
subtitles.english: La+, how was it?

subtitles.original: この5人でライブしたのが初めてだったから、楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was our first time performing live as a group of five, so it was fun!

subtitles.original: ねー！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 初集合、良かったー！
subtitles.english: Our first gathering was great!

subtitles.original: やっぱライブすると違うよね。
subtitles.english: Performing live really is different.

subtitles.original: 声の感じがめちゃ合ってたね。
subtitles.english: Our voices blended together so well.

subtitles.original: 歌、めちゃめちゃ良かった。
subtitles.english: The singing was really good.

subtitles.original: お前ら、歌うめーじゃん！
subtitles.english: You guys are actually pretty good at singing!

subtitles.original: どうも、どうも！
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you!

subtitles.original: お、ここでお知らせがあるみたいですね。
subtitles.english: Oh, it looks like there's an announcement.

subtitles.original: じゃあここでお知らせだ！
subtitles.english: Alright, time for an announcement!

subtitles.original: なんと、我らホロライブ3Dアクリルスタンドに秘密結社holoXが追加されるぞ！
subtitles.english: Guess what? Secret Society holoX is being added to the Hololive 3D Acrylic Stands!

subtitles.original:
ホロライブ 3Dアクリルスタンド
秘密結社holoX > 6月30日追加販売開始
subtitles.english:
Hololive 3D Acrylic Stand
Secret Society holoX > Additional sales start June 30

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Hooray!

subtitles.original: これ、再現しようよ。
subtitles.english: Let's recreate the pose.

subtitles.original: せーの！はい！
subtitles.english: One, two... there!

subtitles.original: いけてるかな？いい感じだね。
subtitles.english: How do we look? Pretty good, right?

subtitles.original: いいじゃん、いいじゃん！
subtitles.english: Nice, nice!

subtitles.original: これで見ても可愛いね。まとまりがあるわ。
subtitles.english: They look so cute even like this. Very cohesive.

subtitles.original: 我らのアーティスト写真的なやつになるわけだね。
subtitles.english: It's like our official artist photo.

subtitles.original: 決まりました、これが宣材写真です！
subtitles.english: It's decided, this is our promotional photo!

subtitles.original: みんな覚えてください！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please remember this!

subtitles.original: 一人一人のやつ見たいな。
subtitles.english: I want to see each one individually.

subtitles.original: じゃあ見せてあげる。商品の画像はこちら！
subtitles.english: I'll show you. Here are the product images!

subtitles.original: 可愛いー！いいじゃん！
subtitles.english: So cute! They're great!

subtitles.original: 全身ちゃんと映ってるね。
subtitles.english: You can see the whole body.

subtitles.original: しかもサイズちょっと大きいよね？
subtitles.english: And the size is a bit big, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 全員まとめて買ってほしいね。
subtitles.english: I hope people buy the whole set.

subtitles.original: 並べてほしいなー！
subtitles.english: I want them all lined up!

subtitles.original: 風呂場とかに並べておきたい。
subtitles.english: I want to line them up in the bathroom or something.

subtitles.original: これ、先輩方のやつと同じ大きさだから、みんなと並べてください。
subtitles.english: Since these are the same size as our seniors', please line us up with them.

subtitles.original: 組み合わせとかもできるしね。
subtitles.english: You can make different combinations.

subtitles.original: こちらはホロライブプロダクション公式ショップにて、このあと21時から販売開始だ！
subtitles.english: These go on sale at the Hololive Production Official Shop starting at 9 PM today!

subtitles.original: さらに、これだけじゃないぞ！
subtitles.english: And that's not all!

subtitles.original: なんと！
subtitles.english: What!?

subtitles.original: 加速するぞ！秘密結社holoX 3Dお披露目記念グッズが販売開始だ！
subtitles.english: Picking up the pace! Secret Society holoX 3D Celebration Goods are now on sale!

subtitles.original:
秘密結社holoX 3Dお披露目記念
6月30日販売開始
subtitles.english:
Secret Society holoX 3D Celebration
Sales start June 30

subtitles.original: やったー！ポーズが違う！
subtitles.english: Hooray! The poses are different!

subtitles.original: カッコイイ！みんな表情がすごい。
subtitles.english: Cool! Everyone's expressions are great.

subtitles.original: そして、まずはこちら！
subtitles.english: And first up, this!

subtitles.original: 我ら、秘密結社holoXアクリルジオラマスタンド！
subtitles.english: Our Secret Society holoX Acrylic Diorama Stand!

subtitles.original: ジオラマなんだ！
subtitles.english: It's a diorama!

subtitles.original: 今回お披露目したアジトに我らが全員集合したジオラマスタンドになってるぞ！
subtitles.english: It's a diorama stand featuring all of us gathered in the hideout we revealed today!

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃいい！集合感あるね。
subtitles.english: That's awesome! It really feels like we're all together.

subtitles.original: 一緒に飾ってほしいね。
subtitles.english: I'd love for people to display it.

subtitles.original: このポーズもみんなで一生懸命考えたんだよね。
subtitles.english: We all worked hard thinking up these poses, right?

subtitles.original: みんな写真撮られるって言ってウキウキだったね。
subtitles.english: Everyone was so excited about getting their picture taken.

subtitles.original: 前で座る？とか後ろ？とか言って。
subtitles.english: We were like, "Should I sit in front?" or "Should I be in back?"

subtitles.original: 考えただけあってめちゃくちゃ揃っててカッコイイ！
subtitles.english: It looks so cool and coordinated, probably because we thought about it so much!

subtitles.original: 我ら！って感じだね。こちらもぜひ手に入れてくれ！
subtitles.english: It really captures our vibe. Please be sure to get one!

subtitles.original: そして、holoX シークレットコンテナボックス！
subtitles.english: And, the holoX Secret Container Box!

subtitles.original: あ、さっきのやつだ！
subtitles.english: Oh, the one from earlier!

subtitles.original: 我らがアジトで使用しているボックスで、貴様らholoXerの分も量産してやったぞ！
subtitles.english: It's the box we use in our hideout, and we've mass-produced them for all you holoXers too!

subtitles.original: ありがたき幸せ！お菓子入れるじゃん。
subtitles.english: We're so grateful! I'm gonna put snacks in it.

subtitles.original: ふざけんな！お菓子とか言うなよ！
subtitles.english: Don't be silly! Don't say things like snacks!

subtitles.original: お揃いなんだからね。お菓子とか言うなよ、秘密だぞ。
subtitles.english: We're matching, you know. Don't mention snacks, it's a secret.

subtitles.original: まあとにかくみんな手に入れてくれよな！
subtitles.english: Anyway, I hope everyone gets their hands on one!

subtitles.original: ということで、次が最後の曲だ！
subtitles.english: And with that, our next song will be the last one!
